describeIssuePlaceholder: e.g., Komatsu PC200 excavator hydraulic arm is slow and leaking fluid from the main cylinder.
fileTypesVideo: PNG, JPG, MP4, WEBM up to {{size}}MB
errorDescriptionRequired: Please provide a detailed description of the issue.
errorInvalidFileTypeVideo: Invalid file type. Please upload an image (PNG, JPG) or video (MP4, WEBM).
errorFileSize: File is too large. Maximum size is {{size}}MB.
interactiveGuideDescription: Click on a repair step below to highlight the relevant part on the image.
editingGuideDescription: Click a step, then click and drag on the image to draw an annotation box.
cameraPermissionDeniedError: Camera access has been denied. To use this feature, please enable camera permissions for this site in your browser settings.
cameraAccessError: Could not access camera. It might be in use by another application. Error: {{message}}
cameraTroubleshooting: Please ensure your camera is connected and you have granted permission for this site to use it.
videoRecordingError: Sorry, there was an error initializing the video recorder.
voiceUnsupported: Voice input is not supported in this browser.
microphonePermissionDeniedError: Microphone access has been denied. To use this feature, please enable microphone permissions for this site in your browser settings.
confirmClearHistory: Are you sure you want to delete all repair history? This action cannot be undone.
arConnectionError: Could not connect to the real-time analysis service.
tooltipLanguage: Select display language and translation target
tooltipDescription: Describe the machinery issue in detail
tooltipUploadArea: Click to upload or drag and drop a file
tooltipTakePhoto: Use your device's camera to take a photo or record a video
tooltipSubmit: Analyze the problem and generate a repair guide
tooltipExport: Export the guide as a printable document
tooltipClearHistory: Delete all entries from your repair history
tooltipToggleHighlight: Click to highlight or un-highlight the part on the image.
tooltipEditAnnotation: Select this step to draw or clear its annotation on the image.
